title: CloudWatch Logs to OpenSearch Analytics
description: Stream CloudWatch Logs to OpenSearch Serverless for real-time log analytics using a serverless pipeline.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project creates an automated pipeline to stream CloudWatch Logs into OpenSearch Serverless for real-time log analytics.
CloudWatch Logs collects and streams log data. Kinesis Firehose buffers and delivers to S3. A Lambda function transforms logs into JSON for OpenSearch.
S3 and SQS enable durable storage and event notifications. OpenSearch Ingestion pulls logs and loads into a Serverless domain.
Deploy serverless resources in AWS console.
Send test log data to pipeline. Query indexed logs in OpenSearch.
